title: Mission: impossible
creator_credit: Brian De Palma, Cruise/Wagner and Paramount Pictures
brief_description: Tom Cruise stars in this high action remake of the television series. The film is an action packed, gadget filled blockbuster with twisting plots, glamour and double crossing secret agents. “Mission: Impossible” is a big-production exciting spy thriller. Cast includes Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Beart, Henry Czerny, Jean Reno, Kristin Scott-Thomas and Vanessa Redgrave.
